description: Sarl El Redhouane is a leading Algerian company specializing in integrated poultry production, offering high-quality meat and egg chickens, vaccinated chicks, and poultry feed produced from international breeds.

Taiba farms is a global agricultural company that connects family farms and small to medium agricultural producers with international markets for food and animal products, and offers franchise opportunities.

niche: Automated Poultry Farm Equipment Manufacturing and Solutions
description: Zhengzhou Livi Machinery Manufacturing CO.,LTD. manufactures and supplies fully automated poultry cage systems and related equipment for commercial chicken farms, offering comprehensive solutions from planning to installation.
Arbor Acres Algérie is a distributor of high-quality poultry grand parent stock, providing consistent supply and technical support to poultry breeders across Algeria.
LOHMANN TIERZUCHT is a global leader in poultry genetics, specializing in the breeding and supply of high-quality parent stock for egg-laying hens.

niche: African Farmland Investment & Real Estate Services
description: African Land provides investors with opportunities to purchase quality farmland across Africa, complemented by a wide range of real estate, property management, and asset acquisition services.

niche: B2B Sales Intelligence and Lead Generation Platform
description: Lusha provides B2B sales intelligence and lead generation solutions, offering accurate company and contact data to help businesses find prospects, enrich CRM data, and accelerate pipeline growth.
